game

Class StateVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.StateVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StateVariable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Container for state values for a single body link at a single timestep.

    These StateVariables are generally stored by State to represent the full runner state.

    Author:
    matt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Make a new StateVariables holding the configuration and velocity information for a single runner link.

      • StateVariable

        public StateVariable(float x,
                     float y,
                     float th,
                     float dx,
                     float dy,
                     float dth)
        Make a new StateVariables holding the configuration and velocity information for a single runner link.
        Parameters:
        x - Horizontal position of the body.
        y - Vertical position of the body.
        th - Counterclockwise angle of the body.
        dx - Horizontal velocity of the body.
        dy - Vertical velocity of the body.
        dth - Counterclockwise angular rate of the body.

      • StateVariable

        public StateVariable(java.util.List<java.lang.Float> stateVals)
        Make a new StateVariables holding the configuration and velocity information for a single runner link.
        Parameters:
        stateVals - List containing the 6 state values for a single link. Order should be x, y, th, dx, dy, dth.
